    • Method Detail

      • inject

        public static void inject(Fragment fragment)
        Shorthand to inject callbacks and extras within a Fragment. Call during or after onCreate.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the Fragment to inject

      • injectExtras

        public static void injectExtras(android.os.Bundle extras,
                                java.lang.Object obj)

        Assigns class variables found in obj annotated with @Extra with their assigned extras within the extras Bundle.

        Recommended to be called during onCreate() in an Activity or Fragment.

        Parameters:
        extras - the Bundle to retrieve extras from
        obj - the class with the annotated extras

      • injectCallbacks

        public static void injectCallbacks(Fragment fragment)
        Inject callback interfaces within a Fragment.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment to inject

      • injectCallbacks

        public static void injectCallbacks(java.lang.Object child,
                                   java.lang.Object parent)
        Inject callback interfaces within an Object.
        Parameters:
        child - the Object holding the callback interface implementation
        parent - the Object implementing the callback interface

      • injectCallbacksMethods

        public static void injectCallbacksMethods(Fragment fragment)
        Inject the no-arg methods that have a @CallbackClick annotation in a @Callback interface with click listeners. This only works for methods that have zero arguments, as annotations do not support Object arguments.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the Fragment to inject

      • createLayout

        public static android.view.View createLayout(android.content.Context context,
                                             java.lang.Object obj)
        Helper method to create a layout within an Object annotated with the @Layout annotation.
        Parameters:
        context - an Activity Context
        obj - the Object with the @Layout annotation
        Returns:
        the layout

      • createLayout

        public static android.view.View createLayout(android.content.Context context,
                                             java.lang.Object obj,
                                             android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Helper method to create a layout within an Object annotated with the @Layout annotation.
        Parameters:
        context - an Activity Context
        obj - the Object with the @Layout annotation
        parent - The view's parent, used for inflating layout attributes (does not automatically attach layout to the parent)
        Returns:
        the layout
